@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2008 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Sebastian Werner (wpbasti) Fabian Jakobs (fjakobs) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Container, which allows vertical and horizontal scrolling if the contents is larger than the container. Note that this class can only have one child widget. This container has a fixed layout, which cannot be changed. Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 


   var scroll = new qx.ui.container.Scroll().set({
     width: 300,
     height: 200
   });

   scroll.add(new qx.ui.core.Widget().set({
     width: 600,
     minWidth: 600,
     height: 400,
     minHeight: 400
   }));
   this.getRoot().add(scroll);

This example creates a scroll container and adds a widget, which is larger than the container. This will cause the container to display vertical and horizontal toolbars. External Documentation Documentation of this widget in the qooxdoo manual.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
content {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem?null} The content widget of the scroll
    container.
@param.description:
The content widget of the scroll
    container.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the content of the scroll container. Scroll containers may only have one child, so it always replaces the current child with the given one.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.Widget} Widget to insert

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the content of the scroll area.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.Widget} Widget to remove

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the content of the scroll container. Scroll containers may only have one child. This method returns an array containing the child or an empty array.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the element, to which the content padding should be applied.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property contentPaddingTop. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #contentPaddingTop}.

@description.name: @description

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the bounds of the given scrollable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
@param.description: Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map with all four bounds (e.g. {"left":0, "top":20, "right":0, "bottom":80}).
@return.description: A map with all four bounds (e.g. {"left":0, "top":20, "right":0, "bottom":80}).

@description.name: @description

@param.name: @param
@param.body: thresholdX {Number} x-axis threshold.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: thresholdY {Number} y-axis threshold.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the axis ('x' or 'y') by the edge type.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} If edgeType is not one of the distinct four ones.
@throws.description: If edgeType is not one of the distinct four ones.

@description.name: @description

@param.body: edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Number} The threshold of the x or y axis.
@return.description: The threshold of the x or y axis.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: axis {String} Can be 'y' or 'x'.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: amount {Number} Amount to scroll which may be negative.
@param.description: Amount to scroll which may be negative.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the amount will exceed the scrollbar max position.
@return.description: Whether the amount will exceed the scrollbar max position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Calculates the threshold exceedance (which may be negative).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: diff {Number} Difference value of one edgeType.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: threshold {Number} x-axis or y-axis threshold.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Calculates the scroll amount (which may be negative). The amount is influenced by the scrollbar size (bigger = faster) the exceedanceAmount (bigger = faster) and the slowDownFactor.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollbarSize {Number} Size of the scrollbar.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the given scrollable on the given axis for the given amount.

@param.description: Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: axis {String} Can be 'y' or 'x'.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Mark the message for translation but return the original message.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} the message ID
